subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{†}} [[long]] [[tail]] [[feather]]s of a [[bird]]; [[rectrix]]
# {{†}} [[bird]]'s [[tail]]
# {{†}} [[animal]]'s [[tail]]
# to [[lift]]; to [[raise]]
# to [[expose]]; to [[reveal]]; to [[uncover]]; to [[arouse]]
# {{lb|zh|colloquial|of wooden plank, paper, etc.}} to become [[twisted]]; to be [[warped]] after getting [[wet]] and [[drying]] up
# [[outstanding]]; [[extraordinary]]
# [[high]]; [[dangerous]]
# {{†}} [[lush]]; [[luxuriant]]
# {{†}} {{lb|zh|historical}} a kind of [[hair]] [[jewelry]] worn by [[ancient]] [[women]], shaped like a [[bird]]'s [[tail]]
# {{†}} {{zh-alt-form|篪|[[ancient]] [[musical instrument]]}}
